RelatedSentence: Nigerian Society of Engineers  ( NSE ) at the weekend , advocated  the privatisation of Nigerian Railways in the country while recommending  a speedy amendment  of the Railway Act through the proposed Railway bill .
NSE President , Engineer Ademola Isaac Olorunfemi  made  the call  during the first Quarterly Press Briefing of the society in Abuja .
